akn:subsection.akn:heading: Investigation of allegations regarding child soldiers

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Investigation of allegations regarding child soldiers United States missions abroad shall thoroughly investigate reports of the use of child soldiers.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Information for annual Human Rights Reports

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Information for annual Human Rights Reports In preparing those portions of the annual Human Rights Report that relate to child soldiers under sections 2151n and 2304 of this title, the Secretary of State shall ensure that such reports include a description of the use of child soldiers in each foreign country, including—

(c) Annual report to Congress If a country is notified pursuant to section 2370c–1(b)(2) of this title, or a waiver is granted pursuant to section 2370c–1(c)(1) of this title, the President shall submit a report to the appropriate congressional committees not later than June 15 of the following year. The report shall include—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Information to be included in annual trafficking in persons report

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Information to be included in annual trafficking in persons report If the Secretary of State notifies a country pursuant to section 2370c–1(b)(2) of this title, or the President grants a waiver pursuant to section 2370c–1(c)(1) of this title, the Secretary of State shall include, in each report required under section 7107(b) of this title, the information required to be included in the annual report to Congress under paragraphs (1) through (5) of subsection (c).
